markdownRemark.html:
Hello! My name is Raymond. I’m a mission-driven software engineer interested in making an impact and using technology to improve the lives of others. I most enjoy working on the front end! Though I have worked across the stack and can put on many hats if necessary.

Technologies I have experience with (or, a bunch of buzzwords): JavaScript, React, Redux, Ruby on Rails, TypeScript/Flow, Gatsby, HTML, CSS, Git, and Figma/Sketch.

Currently I’m a full-stack engineer on the Benefits team at Gusto. I work on delightful features to make healthcare more accessible to small businesses and their employees.

Prior to Gusto, I studied Computer Science and Human-Computer Interaction at Stanford. Originally from New York, I first came to California for school and decided that sun is better than snow. I currently reside in San Francisco and in my free time, I enjoy yoga, reading, hiking, edm, and travel.

Thanks for reading! Here’s a picture of me an incredibly soft llama:
